bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of pain in the bones and teeth associated with a depletion of bone marrow. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 29: 齒者，骨之所終，髓之所養，髓弱骨虛，風氣客之，則齒齭 , “Teeth are the end of bones. They are nourished by marrow. When the marrow is weak, and the bones are depleted , and when wind qi enters to reside there, the teeth will have a feeling as if exposed to sour flavor”.
